Uses of Class
org.strongback.annotation.ThreadSafe

  • Packages that use ThreadSafe 
    Package Description
    org.strongback  
    org.strongback.components
    This package defines a set of components that mirror real actuator, sensors, and other devices.
    org.strongback.control  

    • Uses of ThreadSafe in org.strongback

      Classes in org.strongback with annotations of type ThreadSafe 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  EventRecorder
      Records arbitrary non-continuous events to a log.
      interface  Executor
      An executor that invokes registered Executables on a fixed period.
      interface  Logger
      A simple logging framework.
      class  Strongback
      Access point for a number of the higher-level Strongback functions.
      interface  SwitchReactor
      A class that allows other components to react to the state of switches.

    • Uses of ThreadSafe in org.strongback.components

      Classes in org.strongback.components with annotations of type ThreadSafe 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Accelerometer
      A single-axis accelerometer capable of sensing acceleration in one direction.
      interface  AngleSensor
      A sensor that returns an angle.
      interface  Compass
      A sensor that determines the positional heading, or angular displacement, in degrees.
      interface  Counter
      A simple counter that is safe to be concurrently used (both Counter.get() and Counter.increment()) in one or more threads.
      interface  CurrentSensor
      A sensor the reports the electrical current.
      interface  DistanceSensor
      A distance sensor is a sensor capable of sensing distance.
      interface  Fuse
      A switch that is initially not triggered but that can be (manually or automatically) reset.
      interface  Gyroscope
      A gyroscope is a device that measures angular velocity (in degrees per second) about a single axis.
      interface  Motor
      A motor is a device that can be set to operate at a speed.
      interface  Relay
      A relay is a device that can be turned on and off.
      interface  Solenoid
      A solenoid is a device that can be extended and retracted.
      interface  SolenoidWithPosition
      A special Solenoid that can determine when the solenoid is retracted, extended, or somewhere in between.
      interface  SpeedController
      A component that can report and control the speed.
      interface  SpeedSensor
      A simple sensor that reports the speed.
      interface  Switch
      A switch is any readable device that has an active state when it is triggered and an inactive state when it isn't.
      interface  TemperatureSensor
      A sensor the reports the temperature.
      interface  VoltageSensor
      A sensor the reports the voltage.

    • Uses of ThreadSafe in org.strongback.control

      Classes in org.strongback.control with annotations of type ThreadSafe 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PIDController
      A Controller extension for Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controllers with optional support for feed forward.
      class  SoftwarePIDController
      A software-only Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controller with optional support for feed forward.
